data.message: I'd like to know why it is that our page won't verify. We were verified before, and simply changed the last portion of our company name from management to control. I have had the automated system call multiple times with a code and we are verified through multiple other sites, however, the code does not take and asks us to use business document verification.

replies.message: Hey there. If you're an admin of a local business Page, you may be eligible for a gray verification badge, which you'll see in your Page's settings. Learn more: http://on.fb.me/1mBBwwh.  -Jordan

Thank you, however, the verification process isn't allowing us to receive it. We were verified before our company name change, but when the change was made, our bafdge was removed and when I followed the steps and input the code I was given (5 times I've tried), it says that it can't verify.
